jobTitle: Project Coordinator for IT Finance - Remote | WFH
description:
Are you ready to contribute your skills to a dynamic IT/Finance team? We're seeking an experienced Project Coordinator to support a top-tier organization from the comfort of your home. This is a fully remote, full-time position offering an exciting opportunity to make an impact in a supportive and innovative environment.

About The Role

As a Project Coordinator, your responsibilities will include:

Inbox Management: Handle multiple mail inboxes, including invoicing and company-related correspondence.

Spreadsheet Management: Maintain and update spreadsheets with consultant information, such as POs, RES#'s, term dates, and hire dates.

Purchase Orders (POs): Create and look up POs as needed.

Accounts Payable: Create and track invoices to ensure timely processing.

SAP SuccessFactors: Manage contingents, terminations, extensions, and lookups.

IVANTI: Handle access requests and perform lookups.

PWA Timesheets: Process timesheets and send them to vendors every Tuesday.

Accrual Sheets: Manage invoicing and track hours worked.

Terminations: Process terminations in IVANTI and manage related shared folders.

Shared Site Management: Organize and manage folders in the shared site.

CARS: Input contracts, search for SOWs, and update vendor contact information.

SEC Reporting: Assist with SEC reporting tasks.

Work Schedule

Full-time, 40 hours per week

Monday to Friday, 8 AM - 5 PM PST

Temporary position for approximately 5 months to cover a leave of absence

Minimum Qualifications

1-2 years of relevant experience in an IT/Finance team providing administrative or project support

High school diploma or GED

Strong communication skills

Proficiency in MS Excel

Ability to prioritize tasks and multitask effectively

Pay Rate: $27.50 - $30.00 per hour

Ready to take the next step? Apply now to join our team and make a difference!

Employment Type: Full-Time
